Text.Page:
I hate to ask, but a Mysterium operative sneaked past our lines and headed into southern Basilisk Crag.

He might be dead or he might be some kulkari's dinner. If you could find him and bring him back, I'd be grateful.
(The man is obviously dead. A Mysterium amulet is around his neck. You should gather his belongings and return them to Rhysart.)

These are Jerod's things. Blast it, I warned him about going in there.

Now you know why we've tried to keep the Mysterium out of here in the first place!

I'm sorry he's dead, but at least we can tell his family what happened. Thanks.
